sentences.sContent: The property parameters of stainless steel, full steel sealed type blind rivet .
sentences.sContent_eng: The property parameters of stainless steel, full steel sealed type blind rivet .
sentences.sCn: 不锈钢、 全钢封闭型抽芯铆钉的性能参数图。

sentences.sContent: Every nail driven should be as another rivet in the machine of the universe, you carrying on the work.
sentences.sContent_eng: Every nail driven should be as another rivet in the machine of the universe, you carrying on the work.
sentences.sCn: 钉入的每颗钉子，都应像宇宙机器中的铆钉一样固定，你的工作才能继续下去。

sentences.sContent: When an aluminum rivet is upset against a softer material, a washer must be used under the upset head to prevent eruption of the softer material.
sentences.sContent_eng: When an aluminum rivet is upset against a softer material, a washer must be used under the upset head to prevent eruption of the softer material.
sentences.sCn: 当一个铝铆钉的镦头形成在较软的材料一边时，必需在铆钉镦头下使用垫片以防止较软材料胀裂。

synos.tran: 铆接；固定；（把目光、注意力等）集中于

phrases.pCn: 制铆钉机；铆钉机；拉钉机

words.tran: 用铆钉固定；集中于…（rivet的ing形式）

trans.tranOther: a metal pin used to fasten pieces of metal together
